row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH ! compares two files or directories :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_FILE_BASE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_FILE_BASE_PATH# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_FILE_COMPARE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_FILE_COMPARE_PATH# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
@echo off
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION ! logging parameters :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Base Path" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_BASE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Compare to Path" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_COMPARE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Detail Output" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_OUTPUT# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Hash Function" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_FUNCTION# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Fail If" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_FAIL#
set /a errors=0 > nul
! check for leading EXT: :SET &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 0 :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Base Path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_BASE_PATH# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Compare to Path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_COMPARE_PATH# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Detail Output" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_OUTPUT# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Hash Function" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_FUNCTION# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Fail If" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_FAIL#
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_FILE_BASE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@WINDOWS &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CHECKME# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE_CMD@WINDOWS
set /a EXISTSOURCE=%EXIST% >nul set /a ISFILESOURCE=%ISFILE% >nul set /a ISDIRSOURCE=%ISDIR% >nul
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_FILE_COMPARE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@WINDOWS &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CHECKME# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE_CMD@WINDOWS
set /a EXISTTARGET=%EXIST% >nul set /a ISFILETARGET=%ISFILE% >nul set /a ISDIRTARGET=%ISDIR% >nul
if %EXISTSOURCE% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Base Path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Base Path file/dir '&UC4RB_FILE_BASE_PATH#' does not exist." :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER set /a errors=1 >nul )
if %EXISTTARGET% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Compare to Path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Compare to Path file/dir '&UC4RB_FILE_COMPARE_PATH#' does not exist." :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER set /a errors=1 >nul )
if %ISFILESOURCE% == 1 ( if %ISDIRTARGET% == 1 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Compare to Path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Compare to Path '&UC4RB_FILE_COMPARE_PATH#' does not match type with Base Path '&UC4RB_FILE_BASE_PATH#'" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER set /a errors=2 >nul ) ) else ( if %ISFILETARGET% == 1 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Compare to Path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Compare to Path '&UC4RB_FILE_COMPARE_PATH#' does not match type with Base Path '&UC4RB_FILE_BASE_PATH#'" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER set /a errors=2 >nul ) )
! Check EXT: in value :IF &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 100 set retcode=100 goto :retcode :ENDIF
! stop execution if validation errors occurred if %errors% gtr 0 ( set retcode=1 goto :retcode )
! Start execution :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Compare '&UC4RB_FILE_BASE_PATH#' and '&UC4RB_FILE_COMPARE_PATH#' with detail " :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO#, "output is '&UC4RB_FILE_OUTPUT#' and hash function is '&UC4RB_FILE_FUNCTION#'")
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#file-system-tool.jar" dirfilehandling CompareFeature ? "&UC4RB_FILE_BASE_PATH#" "&UC4RB_FILE_COMPARE_PATH#" ? "&UC4RB_FILE_FUNCTION#" "&UC4RB_FILE_OUTPUT#" "&UC4RB_FILE_FAIL#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
